description: Returns a list of simulation jobs. You can optionally provide filters to retrieve specific simulation jobs.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filters to limit results. The filter names status and simulationApplicationName and robotApplicationName are supported. When filtering, you must use the complete value of the filtered item. You can use up to three filters, but they must be for the same named item. For example, if you are looking for items with the status Preparing or the status Running. (dict) --- Information about a filter. name (string) --- The name of the filter. values (list) --- A list of values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: simulationJobSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of simulation job summaries that meet the criteria of the request.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the simulation job.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the simulation job was last updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the simulation job.

nested_items.name: simulationApplicationNames
nested_items.description: A list of simulation job simulation application names.

nested_items.name: robotApplicationNames
nested_items.description: A list of simulation job robot application names.

nested_items.name: dataSourceNames
nested_items.description: The names of the data sources.

nested_items.name: computeType
nested_items.description: The compute type for the simulation job summary.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous paginated request did not return all of the remaining results, the response object's nextToken parameter value is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListSimulationJobs again and assign that token to the request object's nextToken parameter. If there are no remaining results, the previous response object's NextToken parameter is set to null.
